item.content:encoded:
Intro

Hello,

My name is Achraf Trabelsi,
I created my personal website ğŸ‘¨ğŸ»â€ğŸ’» where you can consult my CV and my various articles that talk about Apple technologies: iOS ğŸ“±, macOS ğŸ–¥, watchOS âŒšï¸, Swift, etc ...

I started iOS development in 2015 during my graduation internship ğŸ“. This is the first time I have touched a macbook in my life. I started to learn the Objective-C language, it was too complicated with its weird syntax. Then I switched to the Swift language, I was amazed ğŸ¤© by this language: safe, flexible, fast ğŸš€. And since then I became passionate about mobile development and especially development for Apple platforms.

I created this website to help me write and share what I learn every day.
